```{r library, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(scales)
library(DT)
library(lubridate)
library(flextable)
```

# COVID-19 daily case data from WHO

```{r data, paged.print=TRUE}
link <- "https://covid19.who.int/WHO-COVID-19-global-data.csv"
download.file(link, "WHO-COVID-19-global-data.csv")
data <- read_csv("WHO-COVID-19-global-data.csv") |> 
  filter(Country_code %in% c("BN", "KH", "ID", "LA", "PH", "TH", "VN", "MM", "SG", "MY"),
         Date_reported >= "2022-01-01") |> 
  mutate(Country = replace(Country, Country == "Lao People's Democratic Republic", "Lao PDR"),
         Country = replace(Country, Country == "Viet Nam", "Vietnam"))
tail(data)
```
# Calcualate weekly data
```{r}
reportData <- data |> filter(Date_reported > "2023-07-13") |> group_by(Country) |> 
  summarise(newCases = sum(New_cases), newDeaths = sum(New_deaths)) |> ungroup()
flextable(reportData)
```


```{r plot}
plot <- ggplot(data) + 
  geom_line(aes(Date_reported, Cumulative_cases, color = Country), linewidth = 1.2) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = label_number(suffix = "M", scale = 1e-6)) +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank()) +
  ylab("Cumulative cases") +
  scale_x_date(labels = date_format("%b-%Y"), name = element_blank()) +
  theme_hc()
plot
```

```{r export}
jpeg("epicurve COVID-19 ASEAN 20 July 2023.jpeg", units="px", width=4000, height=2250, res=300)
plot
dev.off()
```

```{r weekly data}
weeklyData <- data |> filter(Date_reported >= "2022-12-25") |> mutate(week = epiweek(Date_reported)) |> group_by(Country, week) |> summarise(weekly_cases = sum(New_cases), weekly_death = sum(New_deaths)) |> mutate(date = ymd("2022-12-25") + weeks(week))
weeklyDeath <- weeklyData |> group_by(week) |> summarise(death = sum(weekly_death)) |> mutate(date = ymd("2022-12-25") + weeks(week))
```

```{r weekly plot}
cbPalette <- c("#999999", "#E69F00", "#56B4E9", "#009E73", "#F0E442", "#0072B2", "#D55E00", "#CC79A7")
plot <- ggplot(weeklyData) +
  geom_area(aes(date, weekly_cases, fill = Country)) +
  geom_line(data = weeklyDeath, aes(date, death*200, colour = "Number of Death"),
            linetype = "solid", linewidth = 1.2) +
  scale_y_continuous(sec.axis = sec_axis(~ . / 200, name = "No. of Death"), name = "Weekly Cases") +
  scale_x_date(breaks = "1 month", labels = date_format("%b-%Y"),
               limits = as.Date(c('2023-01-01','2023-07-13')), name = element_blank()) +
  scale_colour_manual("", breaks = c("Number of Death"), values = "black") +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank()) +
  theme_hc()
plot
```

```{r export}
png("weekly curve COVID-19 ASEAN 20 July 2023 area.png", units="px", width=4000, height=2250, res=300)
plot
dev.off()
```

# COVID-19 vaccine data

```{r data}
#link <- "https://covid19.who.int/who-data/vaccination-data.csv"
#download.file(link, "vaccination-data.csv")
vacc <- read_csv("vaccination-data (1).csv") |> 
  filter(ISO3 %in% c("BRN", "KHM", "IDN", "LAO", "PHL", "THA", "VNM", "MMR", "SGP", "MYS")) |> 
  mutate(COUNTRY = replace(COUNTRY, COUNTRY == "Lao People's Democratic Republic", "Lao PDR"),
         COUNTRY = replace(COUNTRY, COUNTRY == "Viet Nam", "Vietnam")) |> 
  select(1, 5, 7, 9, 10, 11, 15, 16)
flextable(vacc)
```
